Package org.kuali.kfs.module.bc.util

Class Summary
BudgetParameterFinder A convenient utility that can delegate the calling client to retrieve system parameters of budget construction module.
BudgetUrlUtil Provides helper methods for building URLs to various budget actions.
ExternalizedMessageWrapper  
ImportRequestFileParsingHelper This class contains methods to help parse budget construction import request files
OjbBCPositionActiveIndicatorConversion Handles conversion of active indicator so as to piggy back onto the existing position effective status.
OjbBudgetConstructionFTEConversion Ensures that the database FTE value is rounded to 5 decimal places when reading.
OjbBudgetConstructionPercentTimeConversion Ensures that the database Percent Time value is rounded to 2 decimal places when reading.
OjbPendingBCAppointmentFundingActiveIndicatorConversion Handles conversion of active indicator so as to piggy back onto appointmentFundingDeleteIndicator by reversing the values.
SalarySettingCalculator  
SalarySettingFieldsHolder hold the fields that are frequently used by budget expension or salary setting
